item.title: Portfolio
item.description: This is Web page of Naoya Furudono（古殿 直也）, who is master course sutendent of Tokyo Institute of Technology (Graduate Major in Mathematical and Computing Science). He majors in theory and implementation design of programming language. Contact Contact me through following e-mail address. If you see no address, please wait for 5 seconds. I suspend to show the
